Module project.projectjava
Package backend

Class Database

java.lang.Object
backend.Database
public class Database extends Object
This class links the database to the application.

  • Method Details

    • connectDB

      public static void connectDB() throws ClassNotFoundException, SQLException
      This function connects the application to database by using ojdbc.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - whenever driver cannot be loaded
      SQLException - whenever cannot connect to the database

    • login

      public static boolean login(String username, String password) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      This function authorizes user whenever they log in the application.
      Parameters:
      username - username that the user entered
      password - password that the user entered
      Returns:
      true if the authentication is successful, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - whenever there is a problem relating to database
      ClassNotFoundException - whenever driver cannot be loaded

    • getEmail

      public static String getEmail(String username) throws SQLException
      This function gets corresponding email according to the username.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the user
      Returns:
      email of a user as String
      Throws:
      SQLException - whenever there is a problem relating to database

    • checkEmail

      public static boolean checkEmail(String email) throws SQLException
      This function checks whether an email is already registered.
      Parameters:
      email - an email that needed to be checked
      Returns:
      true if an email is already existed, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - whenever there is a problem relating to database

      Returns:
      true if username is already existed, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - whenever there is a problem relating to database

      Parameters:
      email - email of the user that need to change password
      password - new password that the user entered
      Throws:
      SQLException - whenever there is a problem relating to database

      password - password that the user entered
      email - email that the user entered
      Throws:
      SQLException - whenever there is a problem relating to database

    • checkHost

      public static boolean checkHost(int id, String username) throws SQLException
      This function checks whether current user is the host of an event.
      Parameters:
      id - id of an event that needed to check host
      username - username that needed to be checked
      Returns:
      true if they are the host, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - whenever there is a problem relating to database

      event - event that needed to be added to database
      Throws:
      SQLException - whenever there is a problem with database

    • updateEvent

      public static void updateEvent(Event event) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      This function updates old event only if current user is the host of the event.
      Parameters:
      event - event that needed to be updated to the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - whenever there is a problem with database
      ClassNotFoundException - whenever there is a problem with class loading

      Returns:
      all events in a List.
      Throws:
      SQLException - whenever there is a problem with database
      ClassNotFoundException - whenever there is a problem with class loading

      event - event that needed to be updated new list of participants
      Throws:
      SQLException - whenever there is a problem with the database
      ClassNotFoundException - whenever there is a problem with class loading

    • getNotifyTime

      public static int getNotifyTime(int id, String email) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      This function gets notification time for a reminder.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the event that needed to be reminded
      email - email of the participant of the event
      Returns:
      notify time as Integer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - whenever there is a problem with the database.
      ClassNotFoundException - whenever there is a problem with class loading.

    • setNotifyTime

      public static void setNotifyTime(int id, String email, int time) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      This function sets new notify time for a reminder.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the event that needed to change new reminding time
      email - email of the participant in the event
      time - new notify time
      Throws:
      SQLException - whenever there is a problem with the database
      ClassNotFoundException - whenever there is a problem with class loading

      This function gets the last event's id that has been added to database.
      Returns:
      last inserted id as Integer.
      Throws:
